name: Tutankhamon
description: Tutankhamon (AKA King Tut) by Pyramid Seeds has kept the sour, skunky smell of its parent strain, AK-47, as well as the sativa-dominant effects, making it a great choice for social outings or creative stimulation. This strain has built a reputation for having high THC levels, and the flavor has hints of fresh fruit and flowers that make this beautiful bud fit for a king!
descriptionPlain: Tutankhamon (AKA King Tut) by Pyramid Seeds has kept the sour, skunky smell of its parent strain, AK-47, as well as the sativa-dominant effects, making it a great choice for social outings or creative stimulation. This strain has built a reputation for having high THC levels, and the flavor has hints of fresh fruit and flowers that make this beautiful bud fit for a king!

highlightedReviews.text:
DEAM. Smoking this now one my patio. I usually don't like the skunky taste but this is SMOOTH. White ash on thisJ I rolled. I also rolled it with fresh high quality pipe tobacco, so it's gong down nicely. I'm about 5 minutes into this spliff and I'm already feelin loose. I feel like a stack of flapjacks, with melted butter rolling down my back. LOL. Btw, I need to find me some Pineapple Express.

Okay, 10 mins into it: If all of humanity smoked this strain, I feel like we would live in a much more positive world. Fuck this Trump guy who became president... he needs to get his King Tut on. 

15 minutes: I'm noticing everything now. I need to water these dry ass plants on my patio. I'm realizing now that I don't think I'm responsible enough to grown a nice weed plant, myself. It would really save me some cash. Either way, I'm fine paying the extra price for this strain... because it's BOMB as fuuuaaaack.

20 minutes: Spliffy is just about finished... gonna take a shower and fix up some late brunch. 

Happy Veteran's Day, respect to all who serve, and more respect to all that have lost their life to get to this state of freedom our country is in. With that said, be the best person you can be... and don't let our veterans down.

Props to Garden Of Eden in Hayward, California for selling this strain... and MAJOR PROPS to the anonymous (and unlisted) Farm for growing this thing of beauty. 5-Stars!

When starting the grow for the first time, I went big and chose this strain. now 5 years in, growing several different ladies, this girl still never stops amazing me.. it is a bit tough for beginners, mold, humidity, etc..but well worth the learning experience.. my all-time favorite

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Rare Darkness, Tutankhamon, Quantum Kush, Gemstone, and Tutti Frutti
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week's new strains are in! Whether you're looking to hole up with an indica and watch some Sunday football or planning on a hike with your favorite sativa, we've got a few recommendations for you. Another round of thanks to all of you who nominated new strains this week, and if you don't see your suggestion here, don't forget to check all the newest varieties in the Leafly Explorer!
   1. Rare Darkness
Characteristics of Rare Darkness:

Mostly indica
Cross between Rare Dankness #1 (Ghost OG, Chemdawg, and Triangle Kush) and Grape Ape
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
Grape and berry aroma
Uplifting yet relaxed effects
May help with sleeplessness, headaches, and migraines

   2. Tutankhamon
Characteristics of Tutankhamon:

Mostly sativa
Contains AK-47 genetics
Breeder: Pyramid Seeds
Sour, skunky aroma
Social, creative effects

   3. Quantum Kush
Characteristics of Quantum Kush:

75/25 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Sweet Irish Kush and Timewreck
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Earthy and sweet
Clear-headed, relaxing effects
May help with appetite loss, nausea, or depression

   4. Gemstone
Characteristics of Gemstone:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Skunk #1, Northern Lights, Lavender, and Sour Diesel
Flowery aroma
Deep, relaxing effects followed by a euphoric, energetic peak
May help with anxiety and pain

   5. Tutti Frutti
Characteristics of Tutti Frutti:

Autoflowering hybrid
Cross between Blue Haze, Green Haze, Thai
Breeder: Flash Seeds
Sweet fruity aroma
Uplifting, euphoric effects with a slow onset

growInfo.growNotes:
Can be placed close together
	Sensitive to high humidity and fungus
	Great mother plant, with close compact branches
